page.title: 10LIFESTYLES-Alison Gordon.
page.content: My name is Alison Gordon and I am {ten and a half years old.}I get up at 7.45 and have breakfast. I get dressed at 8.00 and washed at 8.20. I leave for school at 8.45 and arrive t 8.50. {School begins at 9.00.}At 9.05 we have assembly followed by our lessons. Playtime is at 10.45 and lasts until 10.55. This is followed by lessons until 12.00. Our{dinner-time}lasts from 12.00 until 1.00. We then continue our lessons until 2.20 then we have break. After break we read and have our story at 3.00. School finishes at 3.30. I have{tea}at 4.45 then go out to play. I play with my{schoolfriends Stephanie Hinson, Sophie Tilley and Naomi Hill. I go in at 8.00 for my supper.{I go to bed at 9.30.
